thread.title: Opower to Announce Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 10, 2015
thread.title_full: Opower to Announce Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 10, 2015

author: admin
title: Opower to Announce Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 10, 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/20/2015 @ 1:15 PM Companies mentioned in this article: OPOWER 
ARLINGTON, Va. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Opower (NYSE: OPWR), the global leader in cloud-based software for the utility industry, today announced that it will release its third quarter 2015 financial results for the period ended September 30, 2015 after market close on November 10, 2015. 
On that day, management will hold a conference call and webcast at 5:00 p.m. ET to review and discuss the Companyâ€™s results for the third quarter. A recorded version of this webcast will be available after the call and will be accessible at investor.opower.com .
